trans-unit.source: You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

trans-unit.source: She is the apex of the artificer's craft, the spirit of the divine called out of base metal.
trans-unit.target: She is the apex of the artificer's craft, the spirit of the divine called out of base metal.

trans-unit.source: Reminders of Memnarch's reign still skirr across Mirrodin, reminiscent of his form if not his power.

trans-unit.resname: TD2·3 | Steel Wall | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total mana value 6 or less, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: TD2·66 | Innocent Blood | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.
trans-unit.target: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.

trans-unit.target: {4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

trans-unit.source: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this to it.)

trans-unit.target: {1}, Remove two charge counters from CARDNAME: Create a 2/2 colorless Spawn artifact creature token.

trans-unit.source: Each player puts a creature card from their graveyard onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Each player puts a creature card from their graveyard onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: "Death—an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change."\n—Sitrik, birth priest
trans-unit.target: "Death—an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change."\n—Sitrik, birth priest

trans-unit.resname: TD2·71 | Phyrexian Altar | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: Sacrifice a creature: Add one mana of any color.

trans-unit.source: "Your life was meaningless, but your death will glorify Yawgmoth."\n—Tsabo Tavoc
trans-unit.target: "Your life was meaningless, but your death will glorify Yawgmoth."\n—Tsabo Tavoc

trans-unit.resname: TD2·72 | Morbid Plunder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.source: Even the dead are raw materials for the Phyrexian vision of perfection.
trans-unit.target: Even the dead are raw materials for the Phyrexian vision of perfection.

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
